DragonbornCivilian.synopsis: Two teenagers discuss sneaking past the South Span Checkpoint. This is the dragonborn's one-liner.
DragonbornCivilian.how_to_trigger: - Go to 6.5;50;-18.5- Talk to the dragonborn of the Horny Stupid Teenagers vignette

HumanCivilian.synopsis: Two teenagers discuss sneaking past the South Span Checkpoint. This is the human's one-liner.
HumanCivilian.how_to_trigger: - Go to 6.5;50;-18.5- Talk to the human of the Horny Stupid Teenagers vignette

AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat.synopsis: Two teenagers discuss sneaking past the South Span Checkpoint.
AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat.how_to_trigger: - Go to 6.5;50;-18.5- Dialogue should automatically trigger between the dragonborn and the human.

DragonbornCivilian_0.speaker: Gaheid Slickjaw
DragonbornCivilian_0.text: I'm not scared of the authorities... but it'd be stupid to pick a fight with the Fist, right?

HumanCivilian_0.speaker: Hunkers Boolean
HumanCivilian_0.text: Ever wanted to meet the most cowardly dragonborn in the Realms? I fell for the blockhead.

AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat_3.speaker: Gaheid Slickjaw
AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat_3.text: There's no point in arguing with the guards. We're not getting past that checkpoint without the right papers.

AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat_4.speaker: Hunkers Boolean
AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat_4.text: You promised you'd get us inside the city. Said you'd do whatever it takes!

AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat_5.speaker: Gaheid Slickjaw
AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat_5.text: That was before I saw the giant metal monsters guarding the checkpoint.

AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat_0.speaker: Hunkers Boolean
AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat_0.text: What's the worst that can happen if we get caught sneaking in? A few days in a jail cell? At least we'd have a bed!

AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat_2.speaker: Gaheid Slickjaw
AD_SneakingPastTheCheckpointChat_2.text: Worst that can happen is one of those Steel Watchers stamping us into the dirt.
